item.description:
This month, we will be hearing from Fred Blau and his computer services company, MassTechnical, Inc.

All meetings are confidential and all disclosures therein are meant solely for the use of the participants and should not be shared outside of the group without the express consent and permission of the presenter.

To participate, members must agree to maintain the strict confidentiality of any proprietary information that may be disclosed by members to the group. This is not a networking event and all members are expected to respect this policy.

Thank you very much.
item.how_to_find_us: call me at 508-930-4417 if you cannot find us
item.why: For entrepreneurs looking to share ideas and experiences with other entrepreneurs, interested in making a difference in other businesses and in feeling the difference in theirs.
item.name: The MetroWest Small Business Forum June Meeting
